rooms.description: A welcoming open space designed with traditional Kerala aesthetics, featuring polished stone flooring and intricate wood carvings.
Spacious living area with a central seating arrangement and high ceiling to promote natural ventilation as per Vastu principles.
Separate dining space adjacent to the kitchen, allowing easy service while maintaining privacy. Decorated with local motifs.
Functional kitchen integrated into the living area, designed in a way that maintains a balance of energies and practicality per Vastu guidelines.
Primary bedroom with attached bathroom, designed to face the auspicious north-east direction ensuring positive energy flow.
Secondary bedroom ensuring privacy and calm environment.
Additional bedroom designed to accommodate family members or guests.
Further bedroom maintaining consistency in design and layout as per Kerala traditions.
Final bedroom ensuring balance and uniformity in the living spaces.
Well-appointed bathroom for guests, integrated near a common living space for convenience.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to promote positive energy and easy access as per Vastu principles.
Large windows designed to allow ample natural light and ventilation, maintaining alignment with local building norms.
Open balconies that provide cross-ventilation and a connection to the outdoors, following Kerala architectural style.

openings.location: South side of the plot near living areas
openings.description: Dedicated door connecting to a private swimming pool area designed as an outdoor extension.

style: Traditional Kerala-style 'Nalukettu' with farmhouse and penthouse elements

swimming_pool.description: Integrated swimming pool within the plot designed to adhere to safety norms and enhance relaxation.

additional_features.landscaping: Gardens with local flora and pathways paved in traditional Kerala style.
additional_features.water_features: Water bodies for added cooling effect as per Vastu principles.
